resources.string: The average person falls a sleep in 7 minutes.
Approximately one quarter of human bones are in the feet.
The total surface area of two human lungs is approximately 70 square metres.
Octopus have 3 hearts, 9 brains and blue blood.
Human stomach cannot dissolve razor blades.
Child has more bones in their body compared to an adult body .
An ostrich\'s brain is bigger than its eye.
Sound travels 4 times faster in water than in the air.
Fleas can jump 130 times higher than their height, i.e. 6 foot person jumping 780 feet into air.
The loudest sound produced by any animal is 188 decibels. That animal is the African Elephant.
No piece of square dry paper can be folded in half more than 7 times.
Chocolate affects a dog\'s heart and nervous system; a few ounces are enough to kill a small dog.
